name: Hilly Billy
description:
The Poor Billy:

Billy was sitting idle alone in the green forest ... Bored, he wanted to travel around the world. He asked a friend of his to push him in the air so he call roll out wherever he wants!

Your mission:

Let Billy go through forest, desert and hell! But beware of the evil eagles and spiky hedgehogs ! Use the power of space button to jump. Jump higher or lower by adjusting the press button and et le the man roll!

Credits:

Makertoo: Developper and Music

VoldogePool: Developper

AngelOfDreamz: Artist
